game.name: City Wars
game.description:
Running battle has just begun throughout the city. The only who can run fast can win this war of running. We know that you have the skill to be the best runner of your city. Join City Wars game now and make all the entire world believe on your talent. It is a wonderful opportunity to wear the crown of the best runner in a big city in this brand new adventure game. Try to focus on your way and beat your opponents by showing your ultimate running skill. Play well to get the highest score to make feel proud on yourself. 

The job is pretty simple in this one of the best running games for boys. Many of your opponents are roaming around the city in different colors. You as a character have to roam with them and morph all of the individuals you find into your color. Be careful since not all the members roaming over the road are your enemies. Try to show mercy on the white color neutral characters and be careful against the rest of them as they all are your enemies.  

Remember it is only possible to morph your enemies into the same color as you have if your number is greater than them. However, if you still try to do the same, you will lose your game immediately. This is a time-based 3D adventure game where you have to complete the task within two minutes in every stage. Hence, keep your character running and morphing the others. Check out more fun runner war games on our free online game website. All the best to play games online for free here and obtain the best score for you.
